text: Vladimir Viktorovich Kiselyov (; ; sometimes listed as Volodymyr Kyselyov 1 January 1957 – 7 January 2021) was a Soviet-born Ukrainian athlete. He competed in the shot put during his career. He competed for the USSR in the 1980 Summer Olympics held in Moscow, where he won the gold medal. Kiselyov died on 7 January 2021, aged 64.Умер знаменитый украинский толкатель ядра ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ukrainian athletes Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Shot putters
title: Vladimir Kiselyov
